amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 503 of the committee print which limits agency comment periods on water quality permits to 30 days with no possibility of extension.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 112-680 to strike section 503 of the committee print. The existing deadlines in subsections (m) and (q) of section 404 of the Clean Water Act would remain unchanged.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 247 (Roll no. 596).

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 247 (Roll no. 596).
